TGraphErrors * PlotNa22LightYield ()
 Choose specific runs to plot the Na22 coincidence light yield vs time This uses the LightYieldGraph interface, and adds most of the Na22 coincidene runs taken so far where the collimator is at the center of the detector, etc.
